publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2166 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Rule 2.3.1—That the Parliament agrees the following dates under Rule 2.3.1: 18 – 22 February 2002 inclusive, 29 March – 12 April 2002 inclusive, 1 July – 30 August 2002 inclusive, 7 – 18 October 2002 inclusive and 23 December 2002 – 3 January 2003 inclusive. Supported by: Euan Robson*
